task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 6 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Add rate limiting using Redis to enforce 100 req/min authenticated, 20 req/min anonymous
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create src/middleware/rate_limit.rs 2. Use sliding window algorithm with Redis sorted sets 3. Different limits based on authentication status 4. Return 429 status with retry-after header 5. Add rate limit headers to responses

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-6): Implement rate limiting middleware

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verify rate limits enforced correctly for authenticated/anonymous users and proper headers returned
